.modal {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 99;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  animation: fadeOut 0.25s ease-out forwards;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}
.modal button {
  outline: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  border: 0;
}
.modal.open {
  animation-name: fadeIn;
}
.modal.open > section {
  animation-name: slideUp;
}
.modal > section {
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 450px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border-radius: 0.3rem;
  background-color: #fff;
  overflow: hidden;
  animation: slideDown 0.25s ease-out forwards;
}
.modal > section > header {
  position: relative;
  padding: 16px 64px 16px 16px;
  background-color: #f1f1f1;
  font-weight: 700;
}
.modal > section > header button {
  position: absolute;
  top: 15px;
  right: 15px;
  width: 30px;
  font-size: 21px;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-align: center;
  color: #999;
  background-color: transparent;
}
.modal > section > main {
  padding: 16px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #dee2e6;
  border-top: 1px solid #dee2e6;
}
.modal > section > footer {
  padding: 12px 16px;
  text-align: right;
}
.modal > section > footer button {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #6c757d;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 13px;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes fadeOut {
  from {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@keyframes slideUp {
  from {
    transform: translateY(-100px);
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(0px);
  }
}
@keyframes slideDown {
  from {
    transform: translateY(0px);
  }
  to {
    transform: translateY(-100px);
  }
}
